button.title: Button
button.subtitle: Universal button component with support for various styles, sizes and states

basic.title: Basic Example
basic.description: Basic button state, displayed text is determined by the `label` property

icons.title: Icons
icons.description: Button icon is set by the `icon` property, position - `iconPos`

loading.title: Loading
loading.description: Loading state is set using the `loading` property

severity.title: Color Variants
severity.description: Button color palette is set using the `severity` property

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: The `disabled` attribute is used to restrict access to the button

raised.title: Raised
raised.description: Raised buttons have a shadow indicating height: `raised`

rounded.title: Rounded
rounded.description: The `rounded` property makes the button sides rounded

text.title: Text
text.description: Buttons with the `text` property are displayed as text elements

raisedText.title: Raised Text
raisedText.description: Text buttons can be raised using the `raised` property

outlined.title: Outlined
outlined.description: Buttons with `variant="outlined"` property have a border and transparent background

iconOnly.title: Icon Only
iconOnly.description: Buttons can have an icon without text

size.title: Size
size.description: Button size can be changed using the `size` property

badge.title: Badge
badge.description: Button supports displaying a badge using the `badge` and `badgeSeverity` properties

template.title: Template
template.description: Button supports displaying custom content passed inside the button

argTypes.severity: Button color scheme that determines its semantic purpose. Affects background and text color.
argTypes.variant: Visual display variant of the button. Defines the style (filled, outlined, text).
argTypes.label: Button text content. Displayed as an accessible description of the action for screen readers.
argTypes.loading: Loading state. When activated, displays a progress indicator and blocks interaction.
argTypes.disabled: Inactive state. Disables interactivity and visually indicates that the action is unavailable.
argTypes.raised: Elevation effect. Adds a shadow to create visual volume and separation from the background.
argTypes.rounded: Corner rounding. When activated, applies maximum rounding to create a pill shape.
argTypes.badge: Badge indicator. Displays an additional label for notifications or counters.
argTypes.badgeSeverity: Badge color scheme. Aligns with the semantic significance of the displayed information.
argTypes.icon: Button icon. A graphic element that complements or replaces the text content.
argTypes.iconPos: Icon position. Determines the placement of the graphic element relative to the text.
argTypes.size: Button size. Controls the element scale through predefined size variants.
argTypes.default: Default slot content. Replaces standard text content with arbitrary HTML.
argTypes.iconSlot: Icon slot content. Replaces the standard icon with arbitrary graphic content.
